Text: THANKS FOR LOVELY BRUNETTE DOING IT ALL!!!!MISS GREY HAS LEFT PORN FOR THE OTHER SIDE OF HOLLYWOOD!!!DON'T KNOW HER REASONS BUT SHE'LL SOON DISCOVER THAT REGARDLESS OF HER ACTING ABILITY ONLY CERTAIN ROLES ARE AVAILABLE TO GIRLS WITH PORN BACKROUND& ONLY CERTAIN SEGMENT OF GENERAL PUBLIC WILL ACCEPT HER BECAUSE OF HER PORN CAREER!!!SAD BUT TRUE!!!ATLEAST SHE DIDN'T PULL A TRACI LORDS!!!!!
